creator: g8oz@hotmail.com
text:
I don't know if this is the right place to report this, but the latest Apache 
1.3.36 Windows binaries don't seem to be on any mirrors. I need the legacy 
branch - upgrading is not an option for me.

creator: chip@force-elite.com
text:
1.3.35 Binaries are available on archive.apache.org:
http://archive.apache.org/dist/httpd/binaries/win32/

We will no longer be producing win32 binaries for 1.3 -- Reconsider not being
able to upgrade to 2.2.
